001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
005
006/**
007 * Provides commonly used {@link ObjectiveFunction} implementations as
008 * reusable, static singletons.
009 *
010 * <p>
011 * The {@code Losses} class serves as a convenience utility for retrieving
012 * standard objective functions such as Mean Squared Error (MSE) and Binary
013 * Cross-Entropy (BCE). These functions are frequently used in optimization
014 * and machine learning tasks, making them natural defaults for training
015 * pipelines.
016 */
017@StaticUtility
018public final class Losses {
019
020    /**
021     * Predefined Mean Squared Error (MSE) objective function.
022     *
023     * <p>
024     * Internally composed of:
025     * <ul>
026     *   <li>{@link MeanError} for batch-level aggregation</li>
027     *   <li>{@link MeanError} for aggregating sample errors</li>
028     *   <li>{@link ScaledError} with factor {@code 0.5} wrapping a
029     *       {@link SquaredError} for dimension-level error</li>
030     * </ul>
031     * </p>
032     */
033    private static final ObjectiveFunction mse = ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new MeanError(), new MeanError(), new ScaledError(0.5f, new SquaredError()));
034
035    /**
036     * Predefined Summed Squared Error (SSE) objective function.
037     *
038     * <p>
039     * Internally composed of:
040     * <ul>
041     *   <li>{@link SummedError} for batch-level aggregation</li>
042     *   <li>{@link SummedError} for aggregating sample errors</li>
043     *   <li>{@link ScaledError} with factor {@code 0.5} wrapping a
044     *       {@link SquaredError} for dimension-level error</li>
045     * </ul>
046     * </p>
047     */
048    private static final ObjectiveFunction sse = ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new SummedError(), new SummedError(), new ScaledError(0.5f, new SquaredError()));
049
050    /**
051     * Predefined Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) objective function.
052     *
053     * <p>
054     * Internally composed of:
055     * <ul>
056     *   <li>{@link MeanError} for batch-level aggregation</li>
057     *   <li>{@link MeanError} for aggregating sample errors</li>
058     *   <li>{@link BinaryCrossEntropy} for dimension-level error</li>
059     * </ul>
060     * </p>
061     */
062    private static final ObjectiveFunction bce = ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new MeanError(), new MeanError(), new BinaryCrossEntropy());
063
064    private Losses() {
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Returns the shared Mean Squared Error (MSE) objective function.
069     *
070     * @return the predefined MSE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
071     */
072    public static ObjectiveFunction mSE() {
073        return mse;
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * Returns the shared Summed Squared Error (SSE) objective function.
078     *
079     * @return the predefined SSE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
080     */
081    public static ObjectiveFunction sSE() {
082        return mse;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Returns the shared Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) objective function.
087     *
088     * @return the predefined BCE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
089     */
090    public static ObjectiveFunction bCE() {
091        return bce;
092    }
093}
